assets.prompt: Flat pastel cartoon landscape background (16:9) for a toddler find-and-tap transportation game. Soft sky gradient, clouds, subtle road/sea hints at the bottom, playful confetti dots, big clean empty space center for UI, no text.
assets.negative: text, watermark, logo, realistic, dark, scary, clutter
